1.0.name: wordpress/destro
1.0.description: Responsive WordPress magazine theme with 3 home page layouts, 300x250 ads, 125x125 ads, 8 premade (Black, Blue, Red, brown, pink, white and Green) ready to use color schemes/skins, 2 page layouts including a full width page template, featured posts, social icons, twitter updates, threaded comments and widget support.
